thread.title: Bachelor’s Becca Tilley Reveals Whether She’s Still a Virgin; Boyfriend Robert Graham Weighs In
thread.title_full: Bachelor’s Becca Tilley Reveals Whether She’s Still a Virgin; Boyfriend Robert Graham Weighs In

title: Bachelor’s Becca Tilley Reveals Whether She’s Still a Virgin; Boyfriend Robert Graham Weighs In
text:
PHOTOS: When Stars Lost Their Virginity: Megan Fox, Kim Kardashian, George Clooney and More 
"He is very respectful in every aspect of our relationship, so you know, that’s something I was obviously very vocal about on the show," the chiropractic assistant said at the Bachelor charity premiere party benefiting SheLift at Sycamore Tavern in Los Angeles. For his part, Graham chimes in with, "We've talked about it. It was an open discussion, so there was an understanding." Personalities Becca Tilley and Robert Graham attend the premiere party for The Bachelor Charity at The Sycamore Tavern on January 2, 2017 in Los Angeles, California. Paul Archuleta/FilmMagic 
Tilley also offers her thoughts on current Bachelor season 21 cast member Christen Whitney , who is a virgin . “She just comes right out the gate, lets everyone know," Tilley says. "No one has to guess. I think people make a big deal about people being overly sexual or whatever, so I think it’s important to bring both aspects of it, to show there are people on both sides of it who are normal and not sitting in a room by themselves." Graham adds, "Right, not a complete and total freak." You May Also Like
